thread.title: Samsung drops official teaser for Galaxy Unpacked event - Times of India
thread.title_full: Samsung drops official teaser for Galaxy Unpacked event - Times of India

author: TOI Tech Desk
title: Samsung drops official teaser for Galaxy Unpacked event - Times of India
text: Samsung is gearing up to host its next Galaxy Unpacked event in Paris on July 10. Ahead of that, the company has dropped a new global teaser -- titled Unfold your story with Galaxy AI -- of the event to build anticipation around the upcoming announcements during the event. Watch -- Official Teaser: Unfold your story with Galaxy AIhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KygT3Vn4IikSmasung Galaxy Unpacked teaser decodedThe video highlights the key benefits of foldable smartphones and other devices that may be announced at the event. The video uses a series of action verbs to encourage viewers to be creative and not be afraid to try new things. Phrases like “explore a new genre,” “change your angle,” and “ride a different wave” all suggest that this product will help people experiment with their creative process. The line “break barriers” further emphasises that this tool is meant to help people overcome creative obstacles.The teaser ends with the phrase “unfold your story”.In the teaser, Samsung invites fans around the world to step beyond boundaries and enjoy new, unique experiences. Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: What to expectDuring the event, Samsung is expected to announce its next-generation foldable smartphones and wearable devices, including its first wearable ring. The Galaxy Z Fold6 and Galaxy Z Flip6 are speculated to come with an updated -- Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset -- similar to the Galaxy S24 series. Additionally, leaks and rumours have confirmed the Galaxy Buds3 Pro and Galaxy Watch 7 series that will soon launch at the event.
